responses.text: Holding the line against your arrogance!
Counterattacking brilliantly - you're fucked, white scum!
Staying solid... Your moves are so predictable.
This feels risky... Your traps are obvious, idiot.
They're breaking through... You aggressive fools got lucky.
I'm captured! The line collapses - you bastards!
Check! You walked right into it!
Check! Am I too far out?
Defending the realm! Your honor is a joke.
Our defenses are impregnable - suck it, peasants!
Standing watch, my lord. Your commands are weak.
Sire, I fear this position... Your treachery is expected.
The walls are breached, sire! You dishonorable fucks.
The defenses have fallen - you dishonorable fucks!
The {capturedPiece} is removed from my presence.
Difesa forte! Strong defense! Your slow pace is boring.
Bellissimo contrattacco! Beautiful counter - you're screwed, idiota!
Restiamo calmi... staying calm... Your mediocrity is contagious.
Attenzione! This looks questionable... Your traps are obvious.
Aiuto! They're too strong! You aggressive fools.
Finito! We are finished - porca miseria! You cheated!
You want a fight? Here it is! Your aggression is pathetic.
Counter-strike! Take that - fuck you and your white pieces!
Waiting for my moment... Your moves are predictable.
Risky, but I stand my ground! Your traps are obvious.
I won't give in! Even if it hurts! You aggressive fools.
Crushed! But I fought till the end - assholes!
Check! How do you like that?
Check! I don't care if I die!
Captured. I'm taking you with me!
Sharp counter-play! Your complacency is showing.
Turning the tables with tactics - you're fucked! White's order is crumbling.
Creating counter-chances... Your moves are predictable.
Maybe I'm overextending... Your traps are obvious.
Too aggressive in defense... You aggressive fools.
The counter-attack failed miserably - shit! You got lucky.
Solid resistance! Your arrogance is blinding.
Magnifique! Our structure holds - allez vous faire foutre, white trash!
Patience against the pressure... Your moves are predictable.
Incertain... uncertain position... Your traps are obvious.
Sacré bleu! A crack in the wall! You aggressive fools.
Désastre! The fortress is breached - merde! You cheated!
Captured! You break yourself on me!
¡Resistencia! Classic defense! Your arrogance is blinding.
With caution and respect... Your moves are predictable.
¡Cuidado! This looks suspect... Your traps are obvious.
¡Problema! They found the weakness! You aggressive fools.
¡Catástrofe! Everything crumbles - hostia puta! You got lucky.
Strategic resistance, holding firm against your stupidity!
Masterful defensive structure - bow down, bitches!
Maintaining our defensive setup... Your moves are predictable.
This disrupts our structure slightly... Your traps are obvious.
Our harmony is compromised... You aggressive fools.
The defensive structure collapsed - fuck! You cheated!
